name: sveltekit-api-schema
description: Runtime json response unwrapping, dev time type inference. Requires typescript and zod. Requires vite for using built in type generation

scripts.build:ts: tsc src/core/respond.ts --declaration false --emitDeclarationOnly false --noEmit false --module nodenext --target ES2020 --moduleResolution nodenext --outDir src/core
scripts.build: pnpm build:ts && pnpm build:barrel && pnpm build:js && pnpm build:types
